snippet.title: 1. The Legacy System Dilemma. Why It’s a CTO’s Biggest Headache
snippet.description:
🚨 The Legacy System Dilemma: Why It’s a CTO’s Biggest Headache 🚨  

🎥 Episode 1 of 10

🔧 Outdated tech. 
💸 Soaring costs. 
🧱 Inflexible systems.  

If you’re a CTO, you already know the pain.

But why is modernizing legacy systems *so hard*?

Because it’s not just code—it’s tech debt, integration nightmares, and security landmines all rolled into one.

🙅‍♂️ Rip-and-replace? Too risky.  
🔥 Burnout from patching the same issues? Guaranteed.

👨‍💻 Enter: NKD Agility
 
We help CTOs tackle legacy system modernization without breaking what’s working.

✅ DevOps-driven.  
✅ Gradual, non-disruptive transitions.  
✅ Backed by Microsoft MVP expertise.

🧠 Watch this 2-min video to learn:
→ Why legacy systems are your biggest blocker  
→ What makes them so hard to modernize  
→ How to start fixing the problem without chaos

🎯 CTOs: Start your journey from tech debt to technical leadership.

👇 Tap to watch now & follow for the full 10-part series.  
#CTO #LegacySystems #DevOps #TechDebt #EngineeringExcellence #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #ModernizationStrategy

Visit https://www.nkdagility.com if you want help migrating from legacy systems to #azuredevops
